entry.title: Project: Cone Server Setup Guide (v0.93.41)
entry.summary:
ğŸ› ï¸ Project: Cone (PJCone) Server Setup Guide v0.93.41
PJCone is a self-hosted system where users manage their own data. This guide covers how to set up your server most securely and quickly using Docker-Compose.
1. Prerequisites The following tools must be installed to run the server:
Docker & Docker-Compose: Install the version for your OS from the Official Website. Git: Requi...

entry.title: Project: Cone User Guide (v0.93.41)
entry.summary:
ğŸš€ Project: Cone (PJCone) User Guide v0.93.41
An anonymous, self-hosted collaboration and media sharing platform for small teams. PJCone empowers teams to secure data sovereignty by hosting their own servers while providing powerful media viewers for seamless communication.
1. Getting Started (PWA Installation) PJCone is a web-based app. You can use it directly in your browser or install...
